mapper.select: /* menu-function.findListMenuFunc: 메뉴기능 목록 */ SELECT MA.TEN_ID , MA.MENU_CD , MA.ACT_CD , MA.ACT_NM , MA.REGR_ID , MA.REG_DTTM , MA.MODR_ID , MA.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROLE_ACT RA INNER JOIN ROLE RL ON RA.TEN_ID = RL.TEN_ID AND RA.ROLE_CD = RL.ROLE_CD AND RL.STS != 'D' WHERE RA.TEN_ID = MA.TEN_ID AND RA.MENU_CD = MA.MENU_CD AND RA.ACT_CD = MA.ACT_CD ) AS USE_COUNT_ROLE_FUNC ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MENU_ACT_URL MAU WHERE MAU.TEN_ID = MA.TEN_ID AND MAU.MENU_CD = MA.MENU_CD AND MAU.ACT_CD = MA.ACT_CD ) AS USE_COUNT_FUNC_URL FROM MENU_ACT MA WHERE MA.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND MA.MENU_CD = #{p.menu_cd}

/* menu-function.findListMenuPattern: 메뉴 URL 목록 */ SELECT MAUC.MENU_CD , MAU.ACT_CD , MAUC.MENU_ACT_URL FROM MENU_ACT_URL_COLL MAUC LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_ACT_URL MAU ON MAUC.TEN_ID = MAU.TEN_ID AND MAUC.MENU_CD = MAU.MENU_CD AND MAUC.MENU_ACT_URL = MAU.MENU_ACT_URL WHERE MAUC.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND MAUC.MENU_CD = #{p.menu_cd}
